title: 1 Man vs. 10 Models (Speed Dating)
description:
How would you approach speed-dating 10 different models in one night? Would you be nervous? Could you secure a second date? What would you do with your hands?!

I challenged this guy, who gave way too many fucks, to figure it out. 

Check out the full video on my channel.
tags: the subtle art of not giving a f*ck
caption: false

channel_info.title: Mark Manson
channel_info.description: 3x #1 NY Times Bestselling Author. World Champion Non-Fuck-Giver.

transcription: What would you do if you were forced to go on a date with 10 different models in the same night? I decided to set up my friend Garrett to find out. What? There are two ways to approach your relationships. Performance and authenticity. People like Garrett who give way too many fucks, they tend to see the relationships in terms of performance. They see it as saying and doing the right things to make a person like them. Did you play any sports? I personally train people at the gym. I actually have a friend that does something similar to that. It's about halfway through the dates that he started to realize he didn't have to make every girl like him. This is what happens when you start approaching relationships with authenticity. By being unapologetic in who you are and living with the results, by realizing that you don't have to wait around for people to choose you, you can also choose them. So for the last few dates, he defaulted to authenticity, deciding who he was and what he liked and simply not caring what happened next. The results speak for themselves. I'll have to grab your number then. Okay, I'd like that.
